description: Provider Teams can be created to create groups of people, identified by their jwt claims that can be used when writing Access Policies.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

disabled.description: Set the provider team to be disabled.
disabled.title: disabled

excludedSubject.description: A tag expression that identifies user(s) to not include in the team, even if their claims match the subject.
excludedSubject.title: excludedSubject

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.
importHash.title: importHash

importLabel.description: The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the same import operation.
importLabel.title: importLabel

name.description: The name of the provider team.
name.title: name

subject.description: A tag expression that identifies user(s).
subject.title: subject

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime

title: ProviderTeam
